column1: marcella o'donnell| mass of christian burial for marcella odonnell
column9: at st. joseph's catholic church of mobridge. burial will take place at greenwood cemetery under the direction of kesling funeral home of mobridge. visitation is 6:00-7:00pm
column13: with a rosary and scriptural service at 7:00pm
column14: at the church. marcella passed away on wednesday
column17: at the mobridge regional hospital. marcella was born on october 21
column21: to joseph and mary (dreps) damberger. she graduated from herreid high school in 1936 and went on to attend notre dame junior college. she graduated from college in 1937 with a teaching degree. after graduating from college she met james o'donnell and the two were married on april 26
column22: 1940. she is survived by her children
column32: and monica (jim) mushitz of lakewood; 15 grandchildren; 27 great-grandchildren; and 1 great-great-grandchild. she was preceded in death by her husband
